creator: eric.amick@mail.house.gov
text:
Created attachment 24133
FO showing bad output

On a multi-column page which has tables that span all the columns, if the data
fits into two pages, everything is rendered correctly. If the data takes more
than two pages, the third page's data appears to be put into the second page's
second column.

creator: eric.amick@mail.house.gov

Created attachment 24134
FO showing good output

Thanks for your bug report. The issue appears to be fixed in FOP Trunk and the fix will be made available in the next release.

Vincent
